ctx: intros h st h' t es r st' ms Hhandle.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros h st h' t es r st' ms Hhandle.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros h st h' t es r st' ms Hhandle.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 2 patterns.

ctx: intros h st h' t es r st' ms Hhandle.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros h st h' t es r st' ms Hhandle. unfold type_term_log_monotonic. intros Htype. split;[|split]. - unfold type_term_log_monotonic in Htype. destruct (type st');[|inversion Htype]. + destruct (type st);[|inversion Htype]. destruct Htype as [Htype' [Hterm Hin]]. rewrite Htype', Hterm. apply handleAppendEntriesReply_log in Hhandle. rewrite Hhandle. reflexivity. + destruct Htype as [Heq|Heq];[inversion Heq|]. apply handleAppendEntriesReply_type in Hhandle. destruct Hhandle as [Heq|Heq]. * rewrite Heq, Heq in Htype. destruct (type st);[inversion Heq|]. reflexivity. * destruct Heq as [Heq|Heq];[|inversion Heq]. inversion Heq. - apply handleAppendEntriesReply_type_term in Hhandle. destruct Hhandle as [Heq|Heq]. + destruct Heq as [Heq' Heq'']. destruct (type st);[inversion Heq'|]. rewrite Heq'. reflexivity. + destruct Heq as [Heq|Heq];[|inversion Heq]. destruct (type st);[discriminate|]. destruct (type st');[|inversion Heq]. destruct Heq as [_ Heq]. omega. - intros e Hin. rewrite Hhandle. apply Hin.
